alert.note: Alert for Finney (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 22 at 9:14PM CDT until April 23 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL FINNEY...SOUTHEASTERN SCOTT AND WESTERN LANE COUNTIES... At 914 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Shallow Water, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dighton, Grigston, Manning, Healy, Amy and Shields. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
